text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 83.1. Bari kharabi hay nap tool mein kami kerney walon ki 83.2. kay jab logon say nap kerlyty hein to pora pora lyty hein 83.3. Aur jab inhein nap ker ya tool ker dyty hein to kam dyty hein 83.4. kiya inhen apney marney kay bad ji uthney ka khayal nahi
